name: Pi - Number Parkour
description:
In Pi, you can play on a level out of digits. All of the digits are of different platform types. The Number Pi and the square root of 2 are also levels. There is a map editor, where you can create your own levels. But it isn't as easy as it seems, because you can fall through 8 and 2. There are also platforms for the letters A - G.

-------------------------------

Here are the platform types:

  • 2 - Pulls you down, and you can fall through it
  • 6 - Gives you a boost
  • 8 - You can fall through it
  • 0 - Pulls you down and stops your speed
  • All the other digits are setting their height
  • A - Acts like an elevator if you go on it
  • B - Falls down if you go on it
  • C - Is a static platform
  • D - Falls up if you go on it
  • F - (=Finish) If you go over it you won
  • G - Is a static platform too

-------------------------------

There could be some bugs and features that don't work, so we would be happy for feedback. If you have any ideas for platform types or improvements please let me know.

Email: denes.terek@gmail.com

Website: http://dterek.com

-------------------------------

Coming soon:

  • Skins
  • Platform types for any character
  • Tournament mode
  • Levels
  • Bug fixes
